import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import "./BookList.css"; const Book = (book) => { return (
{/*
{book.title}
*/}
Title: {book.title}
Author: {book.author}
{/*
Total Editions: {book.edition_count}
*/} {/*
First Publish Year: {book.first_publish_year}
*/}
) } export default Book
